Glittery Green Potion.name: Glittery Green Potion
Glittery Green Potion.description:
[POTION]
A sparkling, shimmery green potion in a bottle. Who knows what it does...?

Iridescent Green Potion.name: Iridescent Green Potion
Iridescent Green Potion.description:
[POTION]
An iridescent, shimmering green potion in a bottle. Who knows what it does...?

Fizzy Green Potion.name: Fizzy Green Potion
Fizzy Green Potion.description:
[POTION]
A fizzy, carbonated green potion in a bottle. Who knows what it does...?
Can be used in battle and outside of battle, on self or others. Target must be decided before using.

Clear Green Potion.name: Clear Green Potion
Clear Green Potion.description:
[POTION]
A clear green potion in a bottle. Who knows what it does...?
Can be used in battle and outside of battle, on self or others. Target must be decided before using.
